login.title: Sign in to your account
login.subtitle: Welcome back! Please enter your details.
login.invalidCredentials: Invalid credentials. Please check your login ID and password.
login.disabledAccount: Your account is disabled. Please contact an administrator.
login.serverError: A server error occurred. Please try again later.
login.copyright: © EVS Call Pro. All rights reserved.

featureDetail.selectFeature: Select a feature from the sidebar to get started.

users.title: Users
users.description: Manage collaborator accounts, their roles, and permissions.

groups.title: Groups
groups.description: Create agent groups for simplified management and call routing.

planning.title: Planning
planning.description: Manage weekly agent schedules and their various activities.

outbound.title: Outbound Campaigns
outbound.description: Central module for creating and managing outbound calling campaigns.

scripts.title: Agent Scripts
scripts.description: Visual editor to build interactive call guides for agents.

ivr.title: IVR Flows
ivr.description: Visual editor to design inbound call journeys (Interactive Voice Response).

audio.title: Media Library
audio.description: Manage audio files used in IVRs (welcome messages, on-hold music).

records.title: Recordings
records.description: Listen to, download, and search for call recordings.

qualifications.title: Call Qualifications
qualifications.description: Define call outcome statuses for reporting and callback strategies.

supervision.title: Real-Time Supervision
supervision.description: Dashboard to visualize contact center activity live.

reporting.title: Reports & Analytics
reporting.description: Explore historical data and generate performance reports.

history.title: Call History
history.description: Detailed and filterable log of all processed calls.

sessions.title: Agent Login/Logout
sessions.description: Detailed log of agent connection sessions.

trunks.title: Trunks SIP
trunks.description: Manage connections to your telephony providers.

dids.title: DIDs
dids.description: Manage your inbound phone numbers and their routing.

sites-config.title: Sites Configuration
sites-config.description: Manage physical or logical sites for routing and agent assignment.

module-settings.title: Module Settings
module-settings.description: Enable or disable specific features for different user roles.

simplificationTip.title: Information
simplificationTip.content: This section is for information. Managing translations is currently a developer task that involves editing the JSON files directly.

database-client.title: Database Client
database-client.description: Directly interact with the PostgreSQL database. (SuperAdmin only)

system-connection.title: System Connection
system-connection.description: Configure connections to core services like the database and Asterisk.

maintenance.title: Maintenance & Backups
maintenance.description: Manage system backups, restores, and maintenance tasks.

api-docs.title: API Documentation
api-docs.description: Technical documentation for the REST API.

billing.title: Billing & Subscription
billing.description: Manage your subscription, payment methods, and view invoices.

system-settings.title: System Settings
system-settings.description: General settings for the application, like appearance and email.

alerts.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this item? This action is irreversible.

scriptFeature.pageCount: {count, plural, =0 {0 pages} one {1 page} other {# pages}}
scriptFeature.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this script?
scriptFeature.deleteDisabledTooltip: Cannot delete a script that is assigned to a campaign.

ivrManager.noFlows: No IVR flows have been created yet.

userManager.title: User Management
userManager.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, login ID, email...

modal.loginIdHelp: Must be a unique numeric ID with 4 to 6 digits.
modal.loginIdExists: This login ID is already in use.
modal.emailExists: This email address is already in use.
modal.lastSuperAdmin: Cannot change the role of the last SuperAdmin.
modal.useMobileAsStationHelp: If enabled, calls will be placed to the agent's mobile number instead of a softphone.

image.invalidType: Invalid file type. Only PNG, JPG, GIF, and SVG files are allowed.
image.tooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size is 1MB.

agentPreview.invalidPhone: Please provide a valid phone number to insert a new record.
